text: Playa Hermosa-Punta Mala Wildlife Refuge (Hermosa Beach-Mala Point Wildlife Refuge, ), is a protected area in Costa Rica, managed under the Central Pacific Conservation Area, it was created in 1998 by decree 27210-MINAE. == References == Category:Costa Rica Category:Protected areas Category:Nature reserves in Costa Rica Category:Protected areas established in 1998
title: Playa Hermosa-Punta Mala Wildlife Refuge
